name: Keep Robots Simple
description:
Greetings Employee!

As a robo-custodian your job is to ask questions to our fine array of robotic servants and ensure that all of their thought circuitry is functioning correctly.

As per your instructions, any robot showing signs of malfunctioning cognition is to be decommissioned and recycled for parts immediately.

We will be watching.

Made for Terry Cavanagh's Stop Waiting for Godot jam.

Theme: Keep it simple

Programming - Russell Nairn

Art - Pippa Hobbs
